title: Covid cases, deaths rising in U.S., as CDC warns of 'pandemic of the unvaccinated'
content:
1. Covid cases, deaths rising in U.S., as CDC warns of 'pandemic of the unvaccinated'  NBC News
  2. CDC Director Walensky Declares Covid a 'Pandemic of the Unvaccinated'  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. Covid-19 'is becoming a pandemic of the unvaccinated,' CDC director says  CNN
  4. Delta COVID variant now dominant strain worldwide; U.S. deaths surge - officials  Yahoo Singapore News
  5. COVID-19 cases surging in 49 states  WRCB-TV
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国でコヴィドの感染者と死亡者が増加、CDCが「ワクチン未接種者のパンデミック」を警告
美国Covid病例和死亡人数上升，CDC警告说 "未接种疫苗的大流行病"。
美國Covid病例和死亡人數上升，CDC警告說 "未接種疫苗的大流行病"。
